replies.body:
{{champion:16}} I have travel the lands for many years healing and helping those in need. I thought I have saw it all, but looking at you right here, I can say with absolute certainty that you are the most horribly injured person I have ever seen. Both physically and emotionally. 

{{champion:6}} ....thanks.

{{champion:16}}  I mean I have seen people getting toned open by magic or giant creatures and they still looked better then you. 

{{champion:6}} I get it. 

{{champion:16}} I have seen into the Void itself and what terrors it beheld, but you can scare it with how you look.

{{champion:6}} **CAN YOU JUST FIX ME ALREADY!!!?**

{{champion:16}} Oh ummm.....maybe? 

{{champion:6}} Look I have tried plastic surgery, dieting, even those self-help classes, but nothing worked. You are my last hope. 

{{champion:16}} I am? I'll try my best, but promise me that you won't killed yourself if it doesn't work. Even looking like that, your life is still precious. 

{{champion:6}} Don't worry about that. I've tried killing myself but....

_Flashback_

{{champion:203}} ......../**..........**

{{champion:6}} Well? 

{{champion:203}} **I do not want to chase this thing Lamb.**/Let us leave then Wolf. 

{{champion:6}} No! Please come back!. 

_end flashback_

{{champion:16}} I see. Well..let get started then I guess? 

{{champion:6}} Sure. What do I have to lose at this point?

Finally!
I've been waiting for this Cass skin to go on sale all month. x3
It's always the one you want the most that takes the longest. :o
None of the skins are for champions I play... At least that means my wallet is safe this weekend :T
